short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KindSafe is a safe-project internet project. We crawl websites and human-rate family unsafe content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply install the KindSafe.com extension to your browser. From that moment, we will anonymously check every domain you visit for bad content, and we will disable access to that site in case we find family unsafe content. Note that we do not save any information about your visits.
